The new cruise ship's name is a direct reference to Carnival's former 1972 Mardi Gras cruise ship. But unlik… [+1385 chars]

articles.title: How Haven's high hopes of redefining health care came to a crashing halt - STAT
articles.description: A STAT examination found that Haven’s dissolution is the product of a poorly defined mission and a series of strategic blunders.
articles.content: The dissolution of Haven marks one of the most stunning collapses in modern health care history. The venture, led by Amazon, Berkshire Hathaway, and JPMorgan Chase, was heralded immediately as a powe… [+1643 chars]
